com.revolsys.io
Class FileUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.revolsys.io.FileUtil

public final class FileUtil
extends Object

The FileUtil class is a utility class for performing common tasks with classes from the java.io package.

Author:
Paul Austin

deleteDirectory

public static void deleteDirectory(File directory,
                                   boolean deleteRoot)
Delete all the files and sub directories below the directory. If the deleteRoot flag is true the directory will also be deleted.

Parameters:
directory - The directory to delete.
deleteRoot - Flag indicating if the directory should also be deleted.
Throws:
IOException - If a file or directory could not be deleted.

deleteFileOnExit

public static void deleteFileOnExit(File file)
Add the file to be deleted on exit. If the file is a directory the directory and it's contents will be deleted.

Parameters:
file - The file or directory to delete.

getRelativePath

public static String getRelativePath(File parentDirectory,
                                     File file)
                              throws IOException
Return the relative path of the file from the parentDirectory. For example the relative path of c:\Data\Files\file1.txt and c:\Data would be Files\file1.txt.

Parameters:
parentDirectory - The parent directory.
file - The file to return the relative path for.
Returns:
The relative path.
Throws:
IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
